amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 433 which relates to vacant public land grazing allotments when an existing allotment is unusable due to drought or wildfire.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 433, which provides for vacant public land grazing allotments when an existing allotment is unusable due to drought or wildfire.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 251 (Roll no. 399).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 251 (Roll no. 399).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
